items.label: Epic arcs guide
items.content: In depth guide for EVE Online level 4 epic arc missions. Find all about the related missions, enemies, rewards, what to bring and how to start them...

items.label: Map
items.content: Complete X4 map, together with X4 Split Vendetta and Cradle of Humanity systems.

items.label: Resources
items.content: Supplement table to X4 map, gives table overview of resources available in the game.

items.label: Ships
items.content: List of ships with their stats. Still work in progress with the aim of offering the same equipment options as in game so that you can use this application to validate your fits beforehand.

items.label: Efficiency
items.content: Analysis of trading ships currently in X4 Foundations.
